page.title: 20LARKHALL LIFE STYLES
page.content: IN TERMS OF FAMILY BUGETS PEOPLE WITH YOUNG FAMILIES SPENT AROUND Â£200 A MONTH IN FOOD WHILE FOR SINGLE OLD PEOPLE LIVING ON A PENSION IT WAS AROUND Â£30 50% OF PEOPLE DO NOT HAVE A CAR.FOR HOLIDAYS MOST PEOPLE GO TO ENGLAND WHILE ONLY 25% OF HOLIDAY MAKERS GO ABROAD. IN TERMS OF FOOD AND DRINK VERY FEW PEOPLE ARE VEGETARIANS HAVING THREE MEALS A DAY.50% DRINK ALCOHOL AND 10% WERE FREQUENT DRINKERS.ONLY A SMALL MINORITY NOW SMOKE. ABOUT 20% OF PEOPLE HAVE HOME COMPUTERS WITH MOST USING THEM FOR GAMES. CREDITS:COMPILED BY FOURTH YEAR HISTORY PUPILS OF LARKHALL ACADEMY TYPED IN BY ANDREW SHUTTLEWORTH
